com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.test.eclipse
Class MockActivatorBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.test.eclipse.MockActivatorBuilder

public class MockActivatorBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

Builds mock activator objects (and hence modules) for testing purposes. Methods are static to preserve Eclipse's model of having the Activator be statically referenced.

Author:
Darren Creutz

          Builds an activator with mock objects per parameters.

buildMockActivator

public static void buildMockActivator(boolean useRealModuleManager,
                                      boolean useRealResultsHandler,
                                      boolean useRealProblemsHandler,
                                      boolean useRealResultsView,
                                      boolean useRealModuleSelectionView,
                                      boolean useRealMessenger)
Builds an activator with mock objects per parameters.

Parameters:
useRealModuleManager - whether to use a real ModuleManager
useRealResultsHandler - whether to use a real ResultsHandler
useRealProblemsHandler - whether to use a real ProblemsHandler
useRealResultsView - whether to use a real ResultsView
useRealModuleSelectionView - whether to use a real ModuleSelectionView
useRealMessenger - whether to use a real Messenger

buildPurelyMockActivator

public static void buildPurelyMockActivator()
Builds an activator using only mock objects.
